A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Rian Johnson shines with his latest movie "Star Wars: The Last Jedi".
After the Base of the Resistance is being attacked our Heros have to escape. But what they dont know: they can't hide from the evil "First Order"\, led by Supreme Leader Snoke.

Meanwhile Rey has found Luke Skywalker\, but he refuses to help the last remainder of the Resistance. On the other side of the force Kylo Ren is being hectored by the Supreme Leader. Through a connection\, powered by the force\, Rey and Kylo discuss the future of the galaxy and realize that they do not feel pure hate for each other. Great dialogues and intriguing twists and great performances\, especially from Adam Driver\, really highlights this movie.

The weakest part of the movie is the subplot with Finn (John Boyega) and the new character Rose\, with cheesy dialogue and and unsatisfying conclusion. However they meet another Character\, played by (Benicio Del Toro) with big potential for the Star Wars 9.

Poe Dameron (Oscar Isaac) goes rouge after disagreeing with the leaders of the Resistance.

And most imprtantly: We finally get to see the heart-warming scene with Leia and Luke\, we were waiting for in Star Wars 7!
